DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the changes in MRI-derived markers of joint inflammation and destruction and in biochemical markers of connective tissue metabolism and angiogenesis in rheumatoid arthritis patients treated with Enbrel and Enbrel+methotrexate.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Enbrel (Etanercept) Plus Methotrexate Versus Enbrel Alone in Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Despite Current Methotrexate Therapy
DOC.criteria: In the case of contraindications for MRI, the patient may participate in the remaining part of the project.
